duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect and acquire new business clients through various channels, prioritizing opportunities and managing multiple touch points simultaneously.
Engage in face-to-face meetings and networking to build and expand the client portfolio rapidly.
Utilize the CRM platform to streamline client acquisition and maintain a high level of client engagement and management.
Lead client relationship development to drive future revenue growth and renewals, utilizing compelling and persuasive communication skills.
Participate in critical business discussions to address and solve business owners' challenges in promoting and selling products or services.
Analyze market trends and identify growth opportunities to refine sales strategies and enhance client acquisition.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Sales, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
